name: The Adventures of Pan: Quest for The World Flowers
name_original: The Adventures of Pan: Quest for The World Flowers
description:
The Adventures of Pan: Quest for The World Flowers Find the water, protect the flowers, save the world.

The legendary garden hero has returned from beyond the grave to save the world now that the world flowers are in danger! Collect the magic water bottles and water the flowers to save the world and restore balance!

Created in collaboration with XinRan! Go check her out here: https://xinrancheng.itch.io/

Controls WMove Forwards
AMove Left
SMove Backwards
DMove RightSpaceJump (press again to double jump)

MouseMove the camera around (rotate around the player!)

Sound effects used:

https://gamesupply.itch.io/1000-nintendo-sound-effects/download/eyJleHBpcmVzIjoxNjczNjI1MDYyLCJpZCI6NTIwMTE0fQ%3d%3d%2eU5jusU7vW%2fPBmoc3cZaK%2fNOD%2b7w%3d
